wikipedia_page.main: Paul Stuart Davies (born 24 June 1982) is a British soul singer, songwriter and vocal coach, best known for his work on the Northern soul and Motown scene.

response: *Paul Stuart Davies recorded Northern Soul Reimagined EP in 2015, with guidance from Russ Winstanley, presenting classic Northern soul tracks in a new light.
*Paul Stuart Davies (born 1982), British singer and songwriter
Northern soul has also seen a resurgence in the UK and British artists such as Paul Stuart Davies, Johnny Boy and Stefan Taylor have contributed to its popularity in the present day.
